name: saq-template-2
triggers: Phase-gated SAQ model response generator with mandatory retrieval, vertex compression, and validation gates. Use when generating CICM/ANZCA Primary examination SAQ responses, creating model answers, or regenerating existing SAQs. Triggers on: SAQ generation, model answer creation, examination response writing, SAQ regeneration requests. Enforces 5 mandatory phases (Φ0-Φ4) preventing fabricated metadata, ensuring equation-grounded structure, and validating information density.
